product_name: Aquaglide Cascade Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard - 10' 6"
long_description: Ideally suited for travel or anytime that storage space is an issue, this all-purpose inflatable paddleboard is tough enough for whitewater use, and offers great stability for the entry-level paddler.
short_description: Ideally suited for travel or anytime that storage space is an issue, this all-purpose inflatable paddleboard is tough enough for whitewater use, and offers great stability for the entry-level paddler.
